page.title: 06The Bluemull Sound Ferry.
page.content: The North Isles roll-on,roll-off ferry runs from Belmont in Unst,to Gutcher in Yell and Oddsta in Fetlar.Cars can be booked in advance and school children always get passenger priority. The ferry is run by the Shetland Islands' Council and in May 1985 the fare for each journey was Â£1-20 for car and driver,20p for each passenger, all children travelled free. The ferry runs daily to a time-table but can be specially hired or run in an emergency.There are Summer and Winter time-tables which vary little apart from giving more and later runs in Summer.Most links are from Belmont to Gutcher but every day there are at least two links with Oddsta,sometimes via Gutcher. The ferry brings and takes mail, supplies,visitors and residents.
